description.value: Veteran Talent Requirement: Character catches at least three foes unaware in a forest, jungle, or similar area over the course of a single mission Character treats any cover provided by Dense Foliage, Wooded Forests, and other similar natural environments as having an additional +2 AP to themselves and any allies within 5 metres. Dense Foliage Cover: Probably 4AP, Trees: 8AP
